mwUrl.title: Wiki URL
mwUrl.description: The URL of the mediawiki to scrape

adminEmail.title: Admin Email
adminEmail.description: Email of the mwoffliner user which will be put in the HTTP user-agent string

articleList.title: Article List
articleList.description: List of articles to include. Comma separated list of titles or HTTP(S) URL to a file with one title (in UTF8) per line

articleListToIgnore.title: Article List to ignore
articleListToIgnore.description: List of articles to ignore. Comma separated list of titles or HTTP(S) URL to a file with one title (in UTF8) per line

customMainPage.title: Main Page
customMainPage.description: Article Name to use as home page. Automatically built or guessed otherwise.

customZimTitle.title: ZIM Title
customZimTitle.description: Custom ZIM title. Wiki name otherwise.

customZimFavicon.title: ZIM favicon
customZimFavicon.description: URL to a png to use as favicon. Will be resized to 48x48px.

customZimTags.title: ZIM Tags
customZimTags.description: Semi-colon separated list of ZIM tags

customZimLanguage.title: ZIM Language Metadata
customZimLanguage.description: Custom ISO-639-3 language code for the ZIM

filenamePrefix.title: Filename prefix
filenamePrefix.description: Custome filename up to the formats and date parts.

formats.title: Formats
formats.description: Which flavours to build, as `<flavour>:<custom-suffix>`. Empty option is full without suffix.

customFlavour.title: Custom Flavour
customFlavour.description: Custom processor to filter and process articles (see extensions/*.js)

optimisationCacheUrl.title: Optimisation Cache URL
optimisationCacheUrl.description: S3 Storage URL including credentials and bucket

keepEmptyParagraphs.title: Keep empty paragraphs
keepEmptyParagraphs.description: Keep all paragraphs, even empty ones.

minifyHtml.title: Minify HTML
minifyHtml.description: Try to reduce the size of the HTML

osTmpDir.title: OS Temp Dir
osTmpDir.description: Override default operating system temporary directory path environnement variable

outputDirectory.title: Output folder
outputDirectory.description: Output folder for ZIM file or build folder. Leave it as `/output`

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Multiplicator for the number of parallel HTTP requests on Parsoid backend. Otherwise `1`. Reduce on throttled Wikis.

withoutZimFullTextIndex.title: Without ZIM Full Text Index
withoutZimFullTextIndex.description: Don't include a fulltext search index to the ZIM

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: Level of log verbosity, one of info, log, warn, error or quiet. Default is error.

forceRender.title: Force Render
forceRender.description: Force the usage of a specific API end-point/render, automatically chosen otherwise

forceSkin.title: Force Skin
forceSkin.description: Force the usage of a skin (must be available on wiki), default skin automatically chosen otherwise

insecure.title: Insecure
insecure.description: Skip HTTPS server authenticity verification step

langVariant.title: Language Variant
langVariant.description: Use a specific language variant, only for wikis supporting language conversion
